entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
